name: Klee
title: Fleeing Sunlight
description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

normal.1: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Performs up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro> to opponents after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!
description.1: When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro> with every bounce.
description.3: On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
description.4: The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.8: Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend! She can't help but introduce him to everyone.

description.0: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.2: The knights all believe that Klee must have a lucky star watching over her to have never been hurt by any of her own bombs...

description.0: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark.
description.1: This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

upgradedDescription.0: When Klee's Elemental Skill Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, there is a 50% chance to grant her an Explosive Spark. Using her Elemental Skill Jumpy Dumpty or Elemental Burst Sparks 'n' Splash also grants 1 Explosive Spark. Klee can hold up to 3 Explosive Sparks.
upgradedDescription.1: While holding an Explosive Spark, Klee's Charged Attack will consume 1 Spark to perform a special stamina-free Charged Attack, Boom-Boom Strike, dealing 50% increased DMG.
upgradedDescription.4: During the duration of Klee's Elemental Burst Sparks 'n' Splash, her Normal Attack sequence does not reset. If Klee holds an Explosive Spark while performing Normal Attacks, the third attack in the sequence will consume 1 Spark to unleash an additional attack equivalent to Boom-Boom Strike.

description.0: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.
Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

After completing Witch's Homework: Of Leaves That Spark, Klee will become a Hexerei character. When the party includes at least 2 Hexerei characters, you will gain the Hexerei: Secret Rite effect, which enhances Hexerei characters.
description.3: When Klee deals DMG with Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, or Elemental Bursts, she gains 1 Boom Badge that lasts 20s. Each type of attack can grant at most 1 Boom Badge this way, and each badge has its own independent timer. While Klee has 1/2/3 Boom Badges, her special Charged Attack Boom-Boom Strike deals 115%/130%/150% of its original DMG.

description.0: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

upgradedDescription.0: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.
upgradedDescription.1: For 12s after triggering the above effect, Klee's ATK is increased by 60%.

description.0: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

upgradedDescription.0: When Klee's Elemental Skill hits an opponent, that opponent's DEF will be decreased by 23% for 10s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

upgradedDescription.0: An explosion will be triggered if Klee leaves the field while Sparks 'n' Splash is active or when Sparks 'n' Splash ends, dealing 555% of ATK as AoE Pyro DMG. If Klee is on-field when the explosion occurs, its DMG will be increased by 100%.

description.0: Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
description.1: When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

upgradedDescription.0: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
upgradedDescription.1: For 25s after Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all other party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus, and Klee will gain a 50% Pyro DMG Bonus.
4: When Klee uses an Explosive Spark, there is a 50% chance it will not be consumed. Additionally, while Sparks 'n' Splash is active, Klee's Normal Attacks have a 40% chance on the first and second hits to consume an Explosive Spark, dealing an additional attack equivalent to Boom-Boom Strike to her opponent(s).
